subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Rachel Alexandra has an opportunity to become the first filly to capture two-thirds of the Triple Crown, and Calvin Borel has a chance to become the first jockey to sweep on different horses.
snippet: Rachel Alexandra has an opportunity to become the first filly to capture two-thirds of the Triple Crown, and Calvin Borel has a chance to become the first jockey to sweep on different horses.
